origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'BondFuturesAPI.analyze_prices', 'description': 'This function analyzes the price trends of bond futures over a specified time period and for a specific type of bond.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'time_period', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time period for which to analyze the prices, e.g., last_year, last_quarter.'}, {'name': 'bond_type', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of bond for which to analyze the prices, e.g., US_10_year, EU_10_year.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'price_analysis', 'description': 'The analysis of the price trends for the specified bond type over the specified time period.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 BondFuturesAPI.analyze_prices, 它的参数输入如下: 'time_period'是'last_year', 'bond_type'是'US_10_year'.
